alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 7:57PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Flagler, southwestern St. Johns, northeastern Marion, Putnam and east central Clay Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 757 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of Green Cove Springs to Juniper Springs. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palatka, Crescent City, Pomona Park, Hastings, Salt Springs, East Palatka, Andalusia, Juniper Springs, Lake Delancy and Fruitland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay; Western Putnam
